Summary: Very large bright light. Stationary. Was over Lake Michigan. Seemed to "burn out" to a single point and then vanish.
trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Milwaukee
There were no other sightings in Milwaukee on or around January 21st 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home about 9pm on I43 Northbound, 3 of us see a huge white light in the sky over Lake Michigan. Normally we would think this was an airplane or helicopter, but this light was bigger than that and it didn't appear to be moving up, down, or sideways. During this time we were trying to figure out what it was, and within a minute I would say, the light just seemed to burn out to a single point and then vanish. We didn't come to any logical conclusion.
